name: MM Dashboard Sharing
author: Maroun Melhem

sections.description: Adds the ability to share posts directly from the dashboard panel on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, this plugin works with custom posts and pages.
sections.installation:
1. Upload mm-dashboard-sharing to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Check the sharing buttons in the default posts page as well as the custom posts pages
  4. Go to the plugin settings page to customize specific options
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release

2.0

  • Added pages support
  • Added plugin settings page to selectively disable specific buttons
  • Minor styling updates
  • Improved code structure
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload mm-dashboard-sharing to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Check the sharing buttons in the default posts page as well as the custom posts pages
  4. Go to the plugin settings page to customize specific options

short_description: Adds the ability to share posts directly from the dashboard panel on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, this plugin works with custom posts and pages.
description: Adds the ability to share posts directly from the dashboard panel on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, this plugin works with custom posts and pages.

upgrade_notice: Current update adds more accessibility by adding a plugin settings page in addition to several styling changes and improvements to the current code structure.
